ygData.subject: Plan B

Sorry for not answering Silver Sting in this post, I.R.�ll get to him in her 
next one. Promise. & Sorry for the long post.

* Iron Raptor watched Feline leave the room, a rather flustered sigh 
escaping from her throat.
She had thought that she wouldn�t be very comfortable once she explained why 
she had called her here, knowing that the Alliance frightened her so badly. 
And now it almost seems as if she had made matters worse.
Iron Raptor sat up and leaned her elbows against her knees as she hears 
Prowl and Hot Rod, looking at the floor with a tired look in her eyes.
Feline was too upset to go on this mission now, just as she had feared. So, 
now it was onto plan B.
But first, to answer both of these bot�s questions. *

� Oh. Tavatron and Dinobot�s signatures both stopped in Grid 16 and I asked 
Feline if she would run a Search and Recover mission for me. To go and see 
just why both of them aren�t moving anymore, and if they�re damaged or in 
stasis lock to go and recover them. But she�s had some rough spots with the 
Alliance and Grid 16 is just too close to their base for comfort. So, she�s 
upset about it.�

* Iron Raptor then the looked up at the ceiling for a moment before resting 
her head on her heads, looking at the holo-projections of the two missing 
Maximals. Wondering if Feline�s fear for Dinobot was part of it, or maybe 
just a fear of males in general.
She tilted her head to the side for a moment with another sigh.
Well, by what Feline had told her about her experiences with the Alliance, 
she couldn�t really blame her for her fears. But that cat-bot would have to 
learn how to act around the male gender without jittering all the time, it 
was something that would take her a bit of time to get over but eventually 
she would�she had too.
Iron Raptor continued to look at the projections.*

� So, I�ve finally decided that�I�m not going to send her out. She can stay 
here and calm herself down while I go with a bot or two and see what�s up 
with our missing Maximals.�

* That was her plan B, but there was also a part that Feline was going to 
play in it as well.
She wasn�t going to send her out and deal with the problems of bringing both 
of her Maximals back, but she had a feeling that at least one of them was 
extremely injured and needed immediate medical attention. And she could 
almost bet her Second Beast Mode on that Dinobot was that one.
But that also meant that a CR chamber couldn�t heal him all the way, so he 
would need excess attention outside before finally being placed in one. That 
was where Feline came in.
She would treat him with the medical attention that he needed. But since her 
fear of males is the major thing to think about, she would make sure that 
Dinobot would be offline for repairs before she let Feline near him.
Iron Raptor thought that it was a fairly good plan, but she would discuss it 
further with Prowl on her way to Grin16. A second opinion was always handy.
She opened her com-link to Feline with another of her sighs.*

� Feline? About the recovery mission: Don�t worry about it. I�ve decided 
that you can stay behind on this one, give you a chance to calm down a bit 
and gets use to the place a bit more. I�ll be going instead. But�I want you 
to be ready for when we get back, I have a few things for you to do. Does 
that sound alright?�

* Iron Raptor waited with her com-link open, ready to receive Felines 
reply.*
